Fluency, the process excellence platform, now extends its powerful features through our Chrome extension, designed to make automation not only possible but effortless for everyone in your organisation. Start transforming tedious documentation into a seamless, automated workflow right from your browser.

Forget the days of manually typing steps and inserting screenshots. With the Fluency Chrome extension, simply hit ‘record’ and perform your browser-based tasks as usual. From reconciling payments in Xero to managing user roles in Hubspot, Fluency captures every action and intelligently generates precise, step-by-step documentation in seconds.

Fluency understands the context of your actions, ensuring the documentation is not only accurate but minimally requires editing. Need to tweak the details? Our intuitive editing tools are right at your fingertips, making customisations quick and effortless.

Once documented, store your processes securely in Fluency’s process vault powered by AWS, or export them to your desired location. For optimal organization and governance, Fluency allows you to manage your documents with team, project, and tag-based controls, making it the ultimate hub for process documentation and oversight.

Beyond documentation, the Fluency platform enriches your business processes with powerful features like an AI assistant, process insights, Audit View, and no-code automations. Each feature is designed to complement and elevate your operational efficiency, providing you with a comprehensive toolkit for business excellence.

Join us today and experience the transformative power of Fluency with a 7-day free trial, or discuss our tailored Enterprise plans to suit your business needs. The Fluency Chrome extension is not just a tool; it’s a gateway to achieving unparalleled process efficiency and clarity.

Automate SOPs, internal guides, and compliance documentation effortlessly. Centralise your processes and unlock valuable insights into the workflows that drive your business, all with a click of a button in your browser.
